description: A variation of the GM II stationed at the Federation Forces` Torrington base. It has extra armor on its shoulders and left forearm, and is equipped with a twin beam spear for close combat. Because it is purely a local customization, created by reusing spare parts from existing machines, its model number is unchanged. From its appearance, however, it is known as the "Semi Striker."
name: RMS-179 GM II Semi-Striker
